name: Pilau Rice
desc: A rice dish cooked in stock or broth, adding spices and vegetables.

name: Jeera Rice
desc: A rice dish consisting of rice and cumin seeds.

name: Mushroom Pilau Rice
desc: A rice dish cooked in stock or broth, adding spices and vegetables and mushroom.

name: Chicken Fried Rice
desc: A rice dish fried with chicken, egg, onion and Nepalese spices.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
desc: A rice dish fried with mixed vegetables, onion and Nepalese spices.

name: King Prawn Biryani
desc: Biryani dish made from layering rice with a mixture of yoghurt and spice marinated King Prawn.

name: Vegetable Biryani
desc: Biryani dish made from layering rice with a mixture of yoghurt and spice marinated Vegetables.

name: Chicken Biryani
desc: Biryani dish made from layering rice with a mixture of yoghurt and spice marinated Chicken.

name: Lamb Biryani
desc: Biryani dish made from layering rice with a mixture of yoghurt and spice marinated Lamb.
